website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a well-rounded organic shake, this is a solid choice. Made with organic protein and 10 organic fruits and veggies, this shake covers all the nutritional bases with clean, healthy ingredients.
pros: Ready-to-drink packaging is convenient for on-the-go meals or snacks
Each shake contains 8g of grass-fed protein, 10 fruits and veggies, and 21 essential vitamins and minerals for complete and balanced nutrition
Not as sweet as some, but most kids enjoy the flavors
cons: We’d prefer a lower sugar content

customer_reviews.title: Clumps in the boxes......
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 5 boxes of these because my daughter has a feeding tube, and this is the product we have been using for months. I noticed clumps in her bag, and upon further inspection, there were clumps in each case tested. There were also red stickers on all of the boxes I received. Definitely won't be ordering from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lara E.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - kids+adults HATE its toxic chemical flavor!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY - CHILDREN WILL NOT DRINK IT! We should’ve asked other parents BEFORE buying. The stuff tastes like toxic chemicals - no matter how much you refrigerate and shake. My son won’t drink it. My niece and nephew won’t drink it. We’ve even tried giving it away, and 4 other families have declined to take them off our hands, saying that their kids have already tried the stuff and can’t stand it. It tastes like a bad batch of Amoxicillin - BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: 95 Year Old Grandma Loves These!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 95 year old grandmother who is having trouble eating. All her health care providers kept pushing the other brand of nutritional drinks. Once I researched the other brand of nutritional drinks, I knew I needed to find another option. I went with the Orgain kids formula because it was lower in protein which grandma digest better and it had the best taste. Grandma loves the taste and drinks the shake down in about 20 minutes. I know in the hospital grandma has refused the other brand of drinks because of how they tasted and made her feel. I am so happy to have a much better alternative to the other brand of nutritional drinks.
customer_reviews.author: C BECK

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY
customer_reviews.text: My sons are a bit on the small size compared to most of their classmates. We decided to go the healthier route and not get pedisure.....(Ingredients are disgusting) This strawberry milk, as my 4 year old sons call it, taste great. I even drink a few when we're rushing out the door in the morning. Both of my sons have picked up some weight drink these twice a day with their snack. It's been a huge help. Will continue to drink these :-)
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky eaters!
customer_reviews.text: This protein drink sustains my picky 8 year old for years. He has sensory issues, and disgusted from all healthy food he supposed to eat. Him drinking this, gives me some peace of mind. If Orgain would lower the 13 grams sugar content, would be even better!
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Mom

customer_reviews.title: Price keeps increasing and increasing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff for my kiddo!! My biggest complaint is the price for Vanilla which is all she will drink has gradually increased a ridiculous amount in price. 3 months ago 11 dollars, 1 month ago 18 dollars, last week 20 dollars, today 24 dollar!! What gives?!?!?! Great product though.
customer_reviews.author: joshua wojciechowski

customer_reviews.title: Product is EXPIRED!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have been victim of 4 boxes of expired product from 2017. We used Subscribe option and never cared to see expiry date until last night. I have already let Amazon know, just have to send them a picture. But please be careful and check the date before you consume. I feel so bad for my son as he consumed so many of these expired drinks. Maybe that skin itching is caused by this. I'm the one who asked the question about date. When i ask Amazon they tell me as per their inventory team its the manufactured date while Orgain says its the "Best By" date. Absolutely opposite!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Starter

customer_reviews.title: Check dates! Expired product!
customer_reviews.text: Sending out product that’s 2 years expired! This is the second case expired we’ve received!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Roman

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about how great these shakes are. My son has had feeding issue's his entire life. It has been a struggle to keep his weight up. He hated the taste of all the other nutritional shakes and I hated that they were corn syrup based! Not these! And he loves the flavor of all three (chocolate, vanilla, and strawberry)! Recently he was down a couple pounds, about to drop off the growth chart yet again, so we started giving these to him twice a day. He was back up to the 50th percentile by the end of the month. These shakes give us hope and piece of mind. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sara T.

customer_reviews.title: Finicky eater loves Vanilla drink
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves these drinks! She used to like the chocolate, but once she tried the vanilla flavor she would not touch the chocolate, had to give them away. She drinks one everyday for her lunch. She is a fairly finicky eater and this is something she always wants. I tried the PediaSure vanilla powder drink mix, but she thought it was gross. This is pricey for 12 drinks, but worth it for my girl.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Boots

customer_reviews.title: Kids said it tasted gross. Mom agrees.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my kids hated these and said they were gross. I tasted one and I have to agree. It just tastes weird. I wouldn’t drink it, so I certainly didn’t expect them to. Bummer -it’s hard finding a healthy protein drink for kids without a ton of sugar but it seems all the ones out there have a really weird and gross taste. The only one they’ve liked so far is the fair life protein shake but that has over 20mg of sugar. I do best with kefir for protein drinks. They like the flavor and texture, and they get protein with probiotics.
customer_reviews.author: Daina Agostina

customer_reviews.title: Expired, PLEASE check DATE next time
customer_reviews.text: Presentation: well :) However as you can see from the picture provided and the ratings given....I cannot give proper/appropriate ratings due to the expired date. I received the item November 8, 2019 & I have Student Prime so the product took approx 2-: days to come in. Frustrating to know that I feel like I could’ve given an appropriate review, if it hadn’t been expired.
customer_reviews.author: Simrat K Dosanjh

customer_reviews.title: Good but the flavor isn’t great for us
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for my 4 year old who’s a pretty picky eater. He loves strawberry flavored stuff so I thought he would love them. He didn’t. I don’t like them either. They are healthy, I like the packaging, a fair price, and not full of bad ingredients like pediasure so I do like them for that. I’ve been adding half of one to my sons strawberry smoothies and he doesn’t mind it like that. I was hoping for something he would drink without me having to blend it but it’s still okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: He only liked chocolate
customer_reviews.text: My son liked the chocolate so I ordered all 3 flavors. He's 3, autistic and the pickiest eater ever. He did not like vanilla or strawberry and I tasted them to find them chalky. He said he likes the chocolate flavor tho, its not chalky. - I agree. I feel ok giving these to him and wish they had additional flavors he liked. He doesn't need pedisure cuz he's growing normally. I order these because I think the added vitamins are important for a kid who's as picky as my son.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great product, much more comfortable giving my kids these than Pediasure
customer_reviews.text: I feel great giving these to my kids. The brand is a company I trust and have used their adult protein powders in the past and enjoyed them. This is a great alternative in my eyes to Pediasure. I know Pediasure isn't technically a "protein" shake but I would much rather give my kids this item than Pediasure considering the ingredients of this product are much cleaner. My kids love the vanilla flavor and the packaging of these shakes. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Shane

customer_reviews.title: Delicious & Nutritious Shakes!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these shakes today (strawberry flavor) and put one in the fridge right away, about 2 hours later I decided to give one to my daughter (15 months) while I cooked her dinner. I tried it and it was very delicious, and it wasn’t thick either. I gave it to her and she chugged it immediately. My daughter has never been a picky eater, thank God, she would eat anything you put in front of her. But I don’t see any kid that wouldn’t like this. Very yummy and nutritious. I was very glad that’s also grass fed, as I only give my daughter everything organic and grass fed or raw cows milk when available. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yessica

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves taste
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had an accident that required her to raise protein intake, we tried the version hospital recommended and she hated it so I did research and started this about 2yrs ago. She loves these and has one every morning. Seems to be a great product and ages healthy as a horse.
customer_reviews.author: TCPBryson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gross, unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: The idea is good, but unfortunately, this product is absolutely undrinkable. My son (who is under weight) refused to drink it, so I coerced my daughter to try it. When she spat it out, I tried it myself. There is no way I could get it down, and I would not ask my offspring to suffer through it. The aftertaste is the killer.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moller

customer_reviews.title: Like this better than pediasure
customer_reviews.text: Like this better than pediasure, our OT therapist had compared it to crack cocaine for children because of the high sugar content. It doesn't taste bad like other people say, I always taste everything before giving to my kids. My boys love them, I buy the vanilla one so that I can add fruit to make it like a milkshake.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great price on these protein shakes for kids. My toddler doesn’t like eating breakfast in the morning and we’ve started giving him this in the mornings instead. He loves them just as much as he loves regular milk!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Tested, Crunchy Mom Approved
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves these! They're a great supplement to his sporadic eating habits, without being full of sugar or other unnecessary stuff. It's also great that they're shelf-stable and don't need refrigeration until opened, so they can be stashed in the diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Son approved
customer_reviews.text: My son is a super picky eater and autistic so some days they have some issues with getting him to eat lunch at school every day.. and loves strawberry milk. We decided to give this a try to better help him at least get some extra nutrients or have something in the morning that will help carry over and stick with him a bit. He liked the taste of this and I don't think he even noticed a difference. I wish it was something we could get for him more often but it's definitely a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dunagan

customer_reviews.title: High calories toddler drink
customer_reviews.text: My kids thinks these are crack. There are 200 calories per one drink. It makes it tough because she likes the taste so much she wants two or three a day and that’s way too many calories for her. I did taste it and I don’t think it tastes very good. Has a typical protein drink after taste, but she likes it. They are crazy expensive so I doubt I’ll be ordering a ton of them.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Yager

customer_reviews.title: Picky Toddler Approved
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely LOVES these. I have them on subscription to come every 3 weeks my my almost 4yr old. She rarely makes it to 3 weeks before they are gone. It is often difficult to get a picky toddler to eat her veggies... so this was my Hail Mary in getting her to at least drink all the veggies that she should be eating. I am so glad that she loves them so much. She is always excited for her “shakes” to arrive!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Garza

customer_reviews.title: Yummy & tasty as well as affordable
customer_reviews.text: Simple presentations monkey symbols makes my kids love the strawberry drink even more love that it’s organic and healthy my daughter loves it as well ! Also glad it was affordable because some organic products can be pricey ! We’ll done amazon 🙌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: NOT palatable
customer_reviews.text: Although it says 'kid tested' it doesn't say what the results were....my kiddo couldn't stand it. And guess what? Neither could my husband or I....blech! It really tastes like a vat of chemicals. The chocolate is much better.
customer_reviews.author: E. Crow

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised about this product especially after reading some negative reviews about the taste. My 6 year old son actually really likes it. I tasted it and I honestly do not care for the flavor, I'm happy that my son likes it because I had accidentally ordered 2 cases instead of just one to try it out first. It honestly tastes like most protein shakes on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Leigh 29

customer_reviews.title: My 2.5 year old loves these
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES these drinks. We split the little cartons in half by pouring half of the drink in a sippy cup and topping it off with regular, plain almond milk. Makes the whole box of protein milks last longer and cuts the sugar in half for our little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney/Steven

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my 8 year old son and tried it myself! Delicious. I did add some YUP chocolate milk and a teaspoon of expression powder, a little ice in a blender. Amazing. My new breakfast drink. So tasty!!!! My new smoothie in the morning. Nutritious and awesome, smooth, rich, natural taste. I will order again, for sure. An adult drink, too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Newmommy1212

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old loved them.
customer_reviews.text: I seen reviews after I purchased and told my daughter in-law to order for my grandson but I ordered 3. All 3 on different day's. My granddaughter who is 5 lover the vanilla flavor. Nothing wrong with the 3 different orders that I purchased. I think they are great to have. I will look for strawberry flavor to purchase as well. No experation date on my boxes but they are shelf milk and very good.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiannGordon

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting and my kids love it - but can constipate
customer_reviews.text: Came quicker than expected! My kids LOVE this but I found if drunk regularly without eating "roughage" it can cause constipation if kids are already prone to getting stopped up. Tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Tjisagamerr

customer_reviews.title: My son cant get enough of these!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something delicious and nutritious for my son to supplement his dislike of vegetables and to make sure he was getting enough and in the past I’ve used organic myself so I decided to give this a try and he LOVES them. He wants them all day long (I don’t give this to him all day long🙄) although we switched to the vegan ones because he has always had trouble processing milk fat proteins Such as what is found in regular milk.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement for picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: My son is such a picky eater and he loves this drink. It is a bit thick, but it has the vitamins and nutrition to supplement his diet. The straws are collapsible and sometimes get lost in the box when inserted. I find the packaging inconvenient and prefer to pour it into a glass or sport bottle. I wish there was a spout opening or larger container to pour from.
customer_reviews.author: CB331

customer_reviews.title: Bad tasting
customer_reviews.text: It advertises for picky eaters and supposedly good tasting. My 2 year old is extremely picky but he refused these. My 5 year old is not picky what so ever and even he refused these! He drinks a shake daily either carnation or PediaSure but this one was a complete no-go. Definitely would not recommend for a picky eater.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Norman

customer_reviews.title: My son has been drinking these since he was 2!  GREAT TASTE and GREAT NUTRITION!
customer_reviews.text: If your kid doesn't eat right, you need these! We were introduced to these while up at Sloan Kettering for my Mom when she was sick. They were giving them to the children that were being treated there and the parents swore by them, and now, so do we. Designed by a doctor, they have EVERYTHING your lil one needs to grow properly if they don't eat well.
customer_reviews.author: LisaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Organic, tastes great, perfect nutrition
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Perfect for my picky eater who needs a little help gaining weight. Organic shakes are very important to me and I refuse to buy Pediasure with all the artificial ingredients and chemicals in it. I myself drink the regular Orgain shakes and wouldn't dream of giving my kiddos anything less. I do with it were cheaper but I buy it by the case on here when it goes on sale so it works out ok.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Loo

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVES these!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler absolutely loves these shakes! Surprisingly, she doesn’t care for the chocolate but she loves the vanilla. She’s a very picky eater so I feel good knowing that giving her one of these a day gets her extra protein and vitamins and minerals. She barely comes up for air as she is drinking one! LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Tall_CaliGal

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: These taste disgusting. Everyone in the household hates them. Cant even use them as a base in smoothies...the flavor is HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.author: Carly P

customer_reviews.title: Picky eater won’t touch this drink!
customer_reviews.text: So... I bought this for my son who is an extremely picky eater. It says on the box that it’s perfect for picky eaters! No. One sip and he wanted nothing to do with it. My daughter who is not picky at all says it tasted horrible. I tasted it, and I have to agree. Not appealing, kind of like a chalky liquid antibiotic. To make it edible I’m going to have to add it to a smoothie or something which is much less convenient. For the price of twelve of these I can’t just let them go to waste, but I will not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Weingrad

customer_reviews.title: Not as sweet as pediasure
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these, but they probably aren't as sweet because she still asks me for the giraffe shakes (pediasure) which I stopped buying because of GMOs and too many chemicals. I hope in time she will forget about them, and continue enjoying these. She likes them enough to drink two a day, sometimes with a meal, so I will keep buying them.
customer_reviews.author: ColeMc3

customer_reviews.title: Son loves "monkey milk" !
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old talks about and wants this drink all the time...he calls it Monkey Milk. I'll continue to buy and use sparingly due to the high cost. Great for an on-the-go bag since its doesn't need refrigerated!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 7yr old. He absolutely loves the vanilla ones! He drinks them every morning and never fails to remind me that I need to order more when we run low! These give 8g of protein, 3g of fiber, 25 vitamins and nutrients and contain 9g of sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Nash

customer_reviews.title: Makes my 2 year spit up :(
customer_reviews.text: If my son drinks a whole one in a day he spits up and he's 2 years old :( I bought a lot of them and so I can only squirt a little of this into his whole milk at a time to add extra protein. Super disappointed that I spent so much money on protein shakes for my 2 year old when it's too much protein for him to process.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kennel

customer_reviews.title: shouldn't have bought so many without trying them first.
customer_reviews.text: my kids love milk shakes, and general sweet things, so I thought she would like this. I was hoping to find an organic shake to help my picky eater gain some weight. she refuses to drink these, so it was a complete waste of money because I am unable to drink dairy. I've tried offering it multiple times, fresh from the fridge and she barely tastes it and won't finish. she says its "Too sweet!!" and my kid usually likes sweet things. Wish I hadn't bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Triplemom

customer_reviews.title: Better than filling your kids with GMO’S and synthetic crap!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure why this gets bad reviews, it’s way better than giving your kids crap you buy from the store full of preservatives and GMO’S. It’s definitely not a meal replacement, but rather a healthy snack or great for on the go! Feed healthy organic fruits and vegetables first, and all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old says tastes like water
customer_reviews.text: My daughter didn’t like the taste. I got these from the Easter bunny and she won’t drink them. She says they taste too watered down. It could be her preference to another brand I can get at a store
customer_reviews.author: stew

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES these. He doesn't eat or drink much and we have always pushed to get the minimum amount of dairy into him. He loves the taste of these and I love that they are easy to take on the go, and I really like that they aren't a crazy pink color just because it's strawberry flavored. I get all the chemicals in Pediasure l, this is a much better option.
customer_reviews.author: Dini

customer_reviews.title: Awful taste per my kids
customer_reviews.text: My toddler and 11 year old son both do not like the taste. I even tried blending it with fruit and both kids wouldn’t touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kid likes them and the price ain’t bad.
customer_reviews.text: Son loves them. We use them because he’s falling behind on the weight spectrum and he needs a boost.
customer_reviews.author: Link Atrius

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and healthy
customer_reviews.text: My toddler grandkids are addicted to these, so they're only allowed one each per day. Way too expensive to chug. In my opinion they're an acquired taste, but my grandkids never get soda or other sweet drinks, this is it. I like knowing they're ingesting something healthy when they don't want to eat much.
customer_reviews.author: Drumlin

customer_reviews.title: Toddler
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson who use to use the Instant Breakfast mix in chocolate. I was worried he would not like it because it was Vanilla, but he loves it. He is getting the added vitamins he needs and I have peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria G Acosta

customer_reviews.title: We replaced pediasure
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had constipation issues that only seemed to be helped by pediasure. I hated giving her the pediasure bc it's filled with crap. I found this as a replacement. I had to cut it with pediasure in the beginning to get her tastebuds to adjust. Now she drinks this and I feel better about supplementing her meals.
customer_reviews.author: Soumangue

customer_reviews.title: Grandson liked
customer_reviews.text: My grandson won’t eat much and this was a nice switch up from pedia sure
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting per my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter. She usually loves milk products. The 1st drink was greeted with "Disgusting"! She refuses to drink it. What a waste of money. I am dairy intolerant and have to her weird for the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bice

customer_reviews.title: Healthier alternative to Pediasure
customer_reviews.text: My picky 2 1/2 loves these! Vanilla is her favorite. I was advised by her doctor to start giving her Pediasure because we were struggling with getting her to eat at meal times, but when I read the ingredients in Pediasure, I was floored. Corn syrup? Really?! I immediately started looking for a healthier alternative and found these. Needless to say, Orgain kids shakes are our go-to, and I feel more confident in what I'm giving my child for her health.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Davis

customer_reviews.title: Convenient organic nutrition!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in a damaged box, and I had to return my last order but I purchase these regularly in the local grocer and they are perfect for kids. Great size, quality and great source of clean, organic nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Ottley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this product. I wish it was a little cheaper because we would buy it weekly if it was, but when it goes on sale I always get it for them as a treat.
customer_reviews.author: B.Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Wont buy again.
customer_reviews.text: These drinks had very little taste and the consistency was like water.
customer_reviews.author: Karen huffman

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old prefers the vanilla
customer_reviews.text: I mix this in my kids milk on nights they don't way much dinner, or if we're eating junk (pizza, Mac & cheese, etc.) To give a little boost of nutrients. My daughter prefers the vanilla over the chocolate which is saying something. Typically she loves chocolate everything... 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Big NOPE  from my picky eater
customer_reviews.text: Trying to get more calories, protein, and nutrients into my picky eater. She took one sip and said "Yuck" we tried to get her to drink more and she won't. Turned them into Popsicles and she still won't eat.
customer_reviews.author: workin'Mama

customer_reviews.title: Strawberry Organic Protein Shake Review
customer_reviews.text: You can taste the “protein-shake” flavor pretty well but my kids still liked it. The strawberry taste isn’t very strong-it’s more closer to vanilla. Each shake includes a small straw like pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Megan S

customer_reviews.title: Love but Definitely Overpriced Here
customer_reviews.text: Both my 4 yro and myself love these for her! Healthy and great to give when in a rush! I have found cheaper prices through the direct website though...watch out for the promos from Orgain!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Kid loved, mother approved
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES the vanilla. He askes for these, but won't do any other flavor. I feel better knowijg they are getting some nutritional value in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: STLady

customer_reviews.title: Expired
customer_reviews.text: We buy 4 cases (36 drinks) every month thru subscribe and save and we just got our shipment on 7/7/20 and all boxes expire on 7/13/20. I got a refund but now I’m without my subscribe and save pricing ($16 a case vs $20 a case) if I order again.
customer_reviews.author: ekj218

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I am so thankful we found this healthy alternative to pediasure. My son had a feeding problem from birth and the doctor was always saying we had to get him to eat more. They recommended pediasure and we used it for several months but cringed every time we read the ingredients. We found this at the local Natural Grocers. He loves it more than he liked the pediasure. We give him one every evening and he is growing like a champ. We asked the doctor about it and she was pleased we found and alternative to pediasure.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Organic vanilla for the win with my picky eater!
customer_reviews.text: My son is one picky eater and is lactose intolerant, always has been his whole life. When we had to transition from pediasure I was nervous to try these but he loved the vanilla flavor. When you get them at a reasonable price $14 a 12 pack it’s so very worth it. I usually stock up! I can ensure that my little man is getting the vitamins and nutrients he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Gross flavor
customer_reviews.text: Taste is horrible. My kids and the neighbor kids won’t touch them. Lol I’ve tried passing them out since my youngest will not drink them and once someone takes a sip they don’t touch it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cory G

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves these she is 3yrs old asking for the green drink lol helps with all the vitamins n minerals she need to grow my 3rd time ordering them for her thanks amazon
customer_reviews.author: Msk4

customer_reviews.title: Why does the price always fluctuate?
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this product. However I will not buy it for $26 when it used to be $18. I will have to find an alternative until the price returns back to $18.
customer_reviews.author: C S

customer_reviews.title: Grandson's Favorite Drink!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson's Favorite drink! He's a youngster and prone to be quite selective in his eating habits. But this one thing I do know, he loves the 'nilla flavor! I'm so happy grandma and grandpa can provide this healthy treat!
customer_reviews.author: QT

customer_reviews.title: Great breakfast in a pinch!
customer_reviews.text: My kids ages 10/4 love this and have for years.
customer_reviews.author: J&G

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!
customer_reviews.text: My elementary-age son drinks these in the morning because he isn’t a huge fan of breakfast. He has a soy sensitivity, so it was really difficult to find a protein drink that was soy-free and tasted good. These are perfect! He loves them and as long as he eats something small with it, he doesn’t get hangry before lunch time at school.
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed by us big kids too 😁
customer_reviews.text: Kids like the vanilla okay (chocolate likes much better) but I certainly enjoyed the vanilla more 🤭
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Kids like it
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to chocolate milk that my kids are constantly asking for.
customer_reviews.author: Sirah Mirah

customer_reviews.title: Great drink! Great alternative!
customer_reviews.text: This is way better quality than pediasure and I feel better giving this to my slow gainer over pediasure. She gets one drink a day and I would say that not only is she gaining nicely, but also hitting her milestones faster as her development had seemed to stagnate prior to introducing a dietary supplement. Happy about the quality ingredients, and she is happy to drink it!
customer_reviews.author: FTMomma42014

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: As I've said before we love this product and it's so worth it wish it were a little cheaper but I seem to keep buying it so I guess I can't complain too much
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: They taste like strawberry!
customer_reviews.text: We buy the chocolate flavor most of the time. I wanted to get my daughters a different flavor. Bought these, but they didn't enjoy, not that they are a bag product.
customer_reviews.author: Mirella Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: our son said Yucky
customer_reviews.text: our son has organic the majority of his life. he prefers carrots over cookies but he emphatically did not like the flavor or consistency of these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids said no thank you
customer_reviews.text: Love that these are organic. My kids didn’t like these though. I didn’t think they were bad but there is a more distinct taste than the pediasure organics.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My three year old twins LOVE this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this without knowing if the kids would even like it. Lewis would drink two at a time if I would let him :) Surprisingly, the like the vanilla shakes the best. This was my second order, and it won't be my last. I've never seen this in stores and Amazon has the best price online.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Kid isn't thrilled with taste. I tried it and it is kind of watery tasting. First few sips were good but by half way through I was sick of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: good price, great ingredients- not so great taste,
customer_reviews.text: My kids don't like it at all- and we don't eat a lot of sugar, so it's certainly not that they're not that sweet- they just have a strange "protein powder taste to them- wont buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lee

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and nutritious protein shake for kiddos.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product for over 2 years for my grandsons. They both love them and have one daily when they are over. They like the vanilla flavor best. I try not to run out because they see these as a special treat!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and our saving grace!
customer_reviews.text: These have saved us!!!! My daughter has selective eating. Her picky eating is extremely limited, and these have been our saving grace! She has one in the morning, and one in the afternoon usually. Despite her lack of eating these have helped keep her in the 50-60 percentile for weight!
customer_reviews.author: william d cochran

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch two times in a row
customer_reviews.text: The product was defective. We have been drinking this for a few months now and these last two shipments were slimy and gross. We were able to send back the first bad batch, but they would not take back this batch. It’s awful.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old approves
customer_reviews.text: My three year old approves however I like the screw top bottles better not the straw kind bc we usually put his drink in his sippy cup
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great Healthy Option for Kids
customer_reviews.text: By far the best tasting kids shake!! My niece loves all the flavors but has been quite fond of the strawberry. We have tried countless of other brands but my niece will only drink this one! She is a picky eater so I'm glad we found her a go-to snack that is healthy, tasty and she can enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Such an awesome product! So glad I found it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is high energy and her pediatrician recommended getting her some Pediasure nutrition shakes. I wasn't a fan of all the ingredients and lack of vitamins & minerals. These Orgain shakes are organic, have TONS of nutrition and my kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: C. Elley

customer_reviews.title: Horrible tasting
customer_reviews.text: Tastes terrible and my kids wouldn’t drink it. Not even the neighborhood kids who love to mooch off everyone didn’t like them
customer_reviews.author: Watchman

customer_reviews.title: Has a scorched taste
customer_reviews.text: My son will not drink this. I tasted several boxes and it has a scorched flavor to it that I've never tasted in other protein drinks, and I've used a few. Will not rebuy.
customer_reviews.author: Mir G

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately it made kid sick
customer_reviews.text: He loved the taste and was always up for having one but something in it didn’t sit well with him and he started having stomach issues. He’s not allergic to anything so I’m not sure what it was. It stopped as soon as we stopped giving it to him. Too bad, he really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Diaz

customer_reviews.title: My 4yo with autism loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great supplement for kids who need the extra calories and nutrients. Some weeks, Amazon has a better deal with this as this doesn't really ever go on sale. Taste is OK, we usually mix it with other things to balance it out.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Very good nutritious milkshakes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand for the first time. Actually, it tastes good and fragrant. My children like it very much
customer_reviews.author: Liping

customer_reviews.title: My picky eater loves these and I'm happy she's getting proper nutrients
customer_reviews.text: My picky eater loves these and I'm happy she's getting proper nutrients. I have this on my subscribe and save. It doesn't have all the crap ingrediants like other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Ligget

customer_reviews.title: I wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wouldn't drink them at all. Sadly, I wasted my money. Even I tasted them and yhey were pretty bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Olivares

customer_reviews.title: My kid will drink them
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. Wish they had one with added fiber. She needs a gluten-free diet and is very picky so most of the time she drinks Pediasure with extra fiber or she has potty issues.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Delicious, just the right size. The included straw is often frustrating to use (it is a two-part straw which collapses and expands).
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Missing straws
customer_reviews.text: My son says they are really good but my daughter hates them. The only bad part for me is that most the drinks didn't have straws. Kind of expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Mario thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids who don’t want breakfast
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing my 10 year old will put in her body in the morning. We’ve been buying them for years and Amazon is so much cheaper than our local health food store. She loves them and I love that she’s getting nutrients before school!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids didn’t really like the taste
customer_reviews.text: My kids didn’t really like the taste, but I beleive it was because I use to give them pediasure before I started this brand. I beleive they got used to the sweetness from the pediasure. I recommend you start with this one before any protein shake. I am still looking for a healthy organic protein shake that my kids will love
customer_reviews.author: Dolly lollie

product_meta.title: Orgain Organic Kids Protein Nutritional Shake, Vanilla - Great for Breakfast & Snacks, 26 Vitamins & Minerals, 10 Fruits & Vegetables, Gluten Free, Soy Free, 8.25 oz, 12 Count (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:VanillaOrgain Healthy Kids Organic Vanilla Nutritional Shake provides super nutrition and a super taste for even the pickiest eaters. With 8 grams of organic protein and 21 vitamins and minerals it is a perfect nutritional snack for kids to enjoy. These have half the sugar of conventional kids products and are the first ever USDA organic complete nutritional shakes for kids.
feature_bullets: Includes 12 (8.25 ounce) ready to drink orgain kids protein organic vanilla nutritional shakes

8 grams of clean organic protein (from organic grass milk protein and organic whey protein concentrate), 3 dietary fiber, 21 vitamins & minerals, 10 organic fruits and vegetables, organic complex carbohydrates from brown rice, 200 calories per serving
USDA organic, gluten free, vegetarian friendly, soy free, kosher, non GMO, carrageenan free. Free of all artificial colors, flavors, and preservatives
Good source of vitamin C, vitamin D, vitamin E, vitamin B6, vitamin B12, calcium, thiamine, riboflavin, niacin, folate, biotin, pantothenic acid, phosphorus, iodine, and zinc
Healthy and organic nutrition from growing grams kids age 2 and up. Perfect for picky eaters, convenient on the go meals, a quick breakfast, lunch box treats, snacks, before sports, and dessert

specifications.Domestic Shipping: This item can only be shipped to the 48 contiguous states and to APO/FPO/DPO addresses. For APO/FPO/DPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
